00025 include_once ('core/databasemanager.functions.php');
00026 class databaseManagerTest extends PHPUnit2_Framework_TestCase {
00027 
00028         function setUp () {
00029                 global $avModules;
00030                 $this->availableModules = $avModules;
00031         }
00032         
00033         function testLoadModule () {
00034                 $m = databaseLoadModule ('NOTEXISTINGMODULE');
00035                 $this->assertSame ("ERROR_DATABASEMANAGER_MODULE_DOES_NOT_EXITS NOTEXISTINGMODULE", $m);
00036                 
00037                 $m = databaseLoadModule ('MySQL');
00038                 $newMySQL = new mysqlDatabaseActions ();
00039                 $this->assertEquals ($newMySQL, $m);
00040         }
00041 
00042         function testModuleGetAllModules () {
00043                 $allModules = databaseGetAllModules ();
00044                 $allModulesExpected = array ();
00045                 $allModulesExpected['MySQL'] = 'mysqlDatabaseActions';
00046                 $allModulesExpected['EXISTINGBUTNOTWORKING'] = 'EMPTY';
00047                 $this->assertSame ($allModulesExpected, $allModules);
00048                 
00049                 $allModules = databaseGetAllModules (true);
00050                 $allModulesExpected = $this->availableModules;
00051                 foreach ($allModulesExpected as $key => $value) {
00052                         $allModulesExpected[$key] = $allModules[$key];
00053                 }
00054                 $this->assertSame ($allModulesExpected, $allModules);
00055         }
00056         
00057         function testModuleExists () {
00058                 $e = databaseModuleExists ('MySQL');
00059                 $this->assertTrue ($e);
00060                 
00061                 $e = databaseModuleExists ('XMLSql');
00062                 $this->assertFalse ($e);
00063                 
00064                 $e = databaseModuleExists ('EXISTINGBUTNOTWORKING');
00065                 $this->assertTrue ($e);
00066                 
00067                 $e = databaseModuleExists ('EXISTINGBUTNOTWORKING', true);
00068                 $this->assertFalse ($e);
00069         }
00070 }
00071 
00072
